displayName.text: Fyzical Therapy and Balance Centers (Physical Therapy of Harlem)

formattedAddress: 1400 5th Ave Front 5, New York, NY 10035, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1400 5th Ave Front 5, New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text: I have been to Harlem Physical Therapy a few times . Dr. Lena knows how important being physically active is to me and when my meniscus flared up I knew where to go. She provided a thorough assessment and treatment plan that was effective and got me back on track. The staff is so caring and really project that they love what they do. While it was work I really enjoyed the sessions especially when I made progress.  The heat treatments are soo soothing too. They also helped me get marathon ready in 2018 with the anti gravity machine and tips on my gait.  This place is fantastic, if you need physical therapy and want to get back in the game this is the place to go.

originalText.text: At the beginning of the summer I was in dire pain. I have RA and it is currently heavily effecting my right knee. A friend suggested I go to physical therapy with Dr. Lena Washington. The best thing I ever did for my overall health and the way I feel about myself just to be able to move around with more ease. Dr. Washington is awesome as is her staff. The best part is that they are in the neighborhood!

text.text: At the beginning of the summer I was in dire pain. I have RA and it is currently heavily effecting my right knee. A friend suggested I go to physical therapy with Dr. Lena Washington. originalText.text: I had a great experience at PT of Harlem. Dr Washington and staff were all very attentive and empathetic especially when I was in a lot of pain. She is very knowledgeable of different treatment modalities and is determined to help.  She worked diligently to resolve my pain and explained what was going on in a way that was easy to understand.  She always made time to answer my questions and figure out what I needed to work on to get better and followed up to make sure I was feeling better.

text.text: I had a great experience at PT of Harlem. Dr Washington and staff were all very attentive and empathetic especially when I was in a lot of pain. She is very knowledgeable of different treatment modalities and is determined to help.  She worked diligently to resolve my pain and explained what was going on in a way that was easy to understand. originalText.text:
Dr. Washington was an amazing help. She listened to me and treated every one of my injuries throughly. Not only did I have exercises to do in facility she also checked to make sure I was able to accommodate the workouts at home.

Most doctors just tell you what to do she takes her time to explain  and go through each workout throughly! Also adjust based on strength. I actually enjoy my treatments and recovered very quickly! Full strength !

originalText.text: I can’t say enough good things about this place! The staff, right up to the front desk greeting is truly amazing. Dr. Washington is so knowledgeable and really focuses on the importance of getting your body back to good condition and what needs to be done to get it there and even the after care to make sure you stay healthy. I stay on there calendar even for preventative PT! 10/10 would recommend
